art_direction: Eerie space station haunted by alien specters under a blood-red moon

scenes.title: Docking Amidst the Crimson Glow
scenes.text: Alex's shuttle clamped onto the derelict station, its hull groaning like a beast in slumber. Through the viewport, the blood-red moon loomed, casting sanguine hues across the void. Howling winds—impossible in space—whispered through the vents as they disembarked. 'This place feels alive,' murmured their companion, Elara, eyes wide with unease. Spectral figures flickered at the corridor's edge, vanishing like mist.

scenes.title: Whispers in the Command Nexus
scenes.text: They burst into the control room, consoles humming with erratic life. The blood-red moon dominated the viewscreen, its glow pulsing like a heartbeat. Howling echoes intensified, as ghostly apparitions materialized, translucent forms reaching out. 'What do you want from us?' Alex demanded. A spectral voice replied, 'Join the drift... eternal.'
